subject: Re: Logo trademark license vs. copyright license
body:
MJ Ray wrote:
> Arnoud Engelfriet  wrote:
> > I also don't see a need to indicate a field for the mark when you
> > license people to do anything with the mark. So maybe you should
> > just omit the entire Z thing.
> 
> How about to avoid accidentally licensing a second mark in a different
> field which looks identical but we want to license differently?

That's why you don't say "the word 'Debian'" but "the sign registered
as US trademark 123,456 and European trademark D4312".
